casebody.data:
Emma R. MARLOWE, Administratrix of the Estate of Charles Richard Marlowe, Appellant, v. Josephine ROCHE et al., Appellees. No. 15944. United States Court of Appeals District of Columbia Circuit. Argued Jan. 10, 1961. Decided April 13, 1961. Mr. Warren E. Miller, Washington, D. C., for appellant. Mr. Edward L. Carey, Washington, D. C., with whom Messrs. Val J. Mitch and Charles L. Widman, Washington, D. C., were on the brief, for appellees.

Before Wilbur K. Miller, Chief Judge, Phillips, Senior United States *787Circuit Judge for the Tenth Circuit,* and Burger, Circuit Judge.

Sitting by designation pursuant to Sec. 294(d), Title 28 U.S.C.

 PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed. Kennett v. Roche, No. 15892, D.C.Cir., Dec. 20, 1960; Kennet v. United Mine Workers, D.C.D.C.1960, 183 F.Supp. 315.

Affirmed.
